name: OCA Acquisition Corp.
description: OCA Acquisition Corp. is a blank check company formed for the purpose of effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. Established in 2021, OCA Acquisition Corp. seeks to identify and partner with innovative companies in the technology, healthcare, and consumer sectors. The company is led by a team of experienced executives and entrepreneurs who bring a wealth of expertise in investment, management, and operational growth. OCA Acquisition Corp. is focused on creating shareholder value through strategic acquisitions and is committed to fostering growth in the companies it partners with. The firm believes in the potential of emerging markets and technologies that can disrupt traditional industries and improve efficiencies. By leveraging its network and resources, OCA aims to accelerate the growth trajectories of its target companies, enabling them to reach their full potential in a rapidly changing economic landscape. OCA Acquisition Corp. is publicly traded, providing investors with an opportunity to participate in the potential upside of the mergers and acquisitions it undertakes.

seo.meta_title: OCA Acquisition Corp. | Special Purpose Acquisition Company
seo.meta_description: OCA Acquisition Corp. is a special purpose acquisition company focused on strategic mergers and acquisitions in technology and healthcare sectors.

faq.question: What is OCA Acquisition Corp.?
faq.answer: OCA Acquisition Corp. is a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) that seeks to merge with or acquire innovative companies.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of OCA Acquisition Corp.?
faq.answer: Michael Auerbach is the CEO of OCA Acquisition Corp.

faq.question: Where is OCA Acquisition Corp. headquartered?
faq.answer: OCA Acquisition Corp. is headquartered in Miami, Florida, USA.

faq.question: When was OCA Acquisition Corp. founded?
faq.answer: OCA Acquisition Corp. was founded in 2021.
